verbs.description: On [ARGM-TMP: a day] [R-ARGM-TMP: where] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: addressed] [ARG1: the National Rifle Association ’s convention in Texas] , a letter from a suburban teenager brought Senator Dick Durbin to a local high school .
